Uses of Class
main.sprites.Sprite

  • Packages that use Sprite 
    Package Description
    main  
    main.sprites  
    main.sprites.blocks  
    main.sprites.enemies  
    main.sprites.powerups

    • Uses of Sprite in main

      Methods in main that return types with arguments of type Sprite 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<Sprite> SpriteHandler.getCurrentCast()
      To get the main Sprites: The Player (Mario), Stage Floor, Flag Pole.
      Only Mario is dynamic Sprite, rest are static.
      Sprites that do not belong to any of the Interfaces must be accessed from here.
      Methods in main with parameters of type Sprite 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void SpriteHandler.addToCurrentCast(Sprite... sprites)
      Adds Sprite to a separate list.
